p: Comparison of the chemical profiles of MEO Fl and MEO Lv with Monarda essential oils reported previously showed that they all contained the common oxygenated monoterpene carvacrol. However, essential oils isolated from plants harvested from field rows contained relatively high amounts of p-cymene (35%) and 1-octen-3-ol (10%) and a low content of thymol (0.2%) [ 16].
